- Interface usability improvements
- Player progression improvements
- Various tweaks and bug fixes

- You’ve all waited for them, and now they’re here - cyclical special events (including cricket mode!)
- A new arena (Anna’s Diner) replaced the Tree Arena
- Minor bug fixes and improvements

- You’ve all waited for them, and now they’re here - cyclical special events (including cricket mode!)
- A new arena (Anna’s Diner) replaced the Tree Arena

New 2.2.0 update is live!
We've worked extremely hard and prepared a lot of improvements based on your comments. Now darting is even greater an experience!

Here’s a handful of the changes:
- Challenges and events will count towards league points now!
- Missed some events? No worries! Now we’ll be reminding you of the cool new ones that have just started!
- We’ve touched up our UI with some make-up, so the game should be more eye-pleasing
- We’ve prepared some new juicy offers and more dart sets, which are coming soon!
- We’ve worked on connectivity improvements as well as indicators that will notify you when your connection is about to break up
- We’ve squashed as many bugs as we could (both found by our great QA team and reported by our finest community) and we are continuing to search for more!

New features are coming soon so stay tuned and good luck with those triple 20s!

New 2.2.0 update is live!
We've worked extremely hard and prepared a lot of improvements based on your comments. Now darting is even greater an experience!

Here’s a handful of the changes:
- Challenges and events will count towards league points now!
- Missed some events? No worries! Now we’ll be reminding you of the cool new ones that have just started!
- We’ve touched up our UI with some make-up, so the game should be more eye-pleasing
- We’ve prepared some new juicy offers and more dart sets, which are coming soon!
- We’ve worked on connectivity improvements as well as indicators that will notify you when your connection is about to break up
- We’ve squashed as many bugs as we could (both found by our great QA team and reported by our finest community) and we are continuing to search for more!

New features are coming soon so stay tuned and good luck with those triple 20s!

New 2.2.3 update is live!
We have been adamantly focused on improving your gaming experience so we have been investigating those nasty connection issues and, hopefully, will already have fixed them.
If you stumble upon any issues, have no worries! Contact us either via Facebook or directly via mail: support@boombit.com

New features are coming soon so stay tuned and good luck hitting those triple 20s!

New 2.2.4 update is live!
Our network servers were a bit overweight, so we’ve sent them to get a workout. Hopefully they will work faster now! It’s not the end of our work, however, so if you stumble upon any issues, have no worries! Contact us either via Facebook or directly at: support@boombit.com.

New features are coming soon, so stay tuned and good luck hitting those tripie 20s!

Our network servers were a bit overweight, so we’ve sent them to get a workout. Hopefully they will work faster now! It’s not the end of our work, however, so if you stumble upon any issues, have no worries! Contact us either via Facebook or directly at: support@boombit.com.

New features are coming soon, so stay tuned and good luck hitting those tripie 20s!

- Playing with friends is now possible
- A tiebreaker will now start in event of a draw
- New event is coming soon

Of course it’s not the end of our work, so if you stumble upon any issues, have no worries! Contact us either via Facebook or directly at: support@boombit.com.

- Legendary Darts - Brand new legendary darts are coming to the game very soon. Don’t miss special offers and events to get them faster!
- Reconnect System - lost the Internet connection? Now you can reconnect to the game!
- Various minor tweaks and improvements

For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

- Legendary Darts - Brand new legendary darts are coming to the game very soon. Don’t miss special offers and events to get them faster!
- Reconnect System - lost the Internet connection? Now you can reconnect to the game!
- Various minor tweaks and improvements

For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

New big update is here!

* Introducing Seasons: get the highest possible score before the end of the month and win amazing Season Chest!
* 3 brand new arenas with 9 lovely darts.
* Christmas offers and special events.

For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

New short update is live:

- Introducing Player avatars - you can change them from your player profile
- Bug fixes (among others: fix for daily gold limit)
- Preparing game next big feature: Clubs!

For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

New short update is live:
- We focused all our work towards bug fixes, game should work properly now (connection issues in play with friends and special events shouldn't happen now)
- Introducing Player avatars - you can change them from your player profile
- Preparing game for next big feature: Clubs!
For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

New short update is live:
- We focused all our work towards bug fixes, game should work properly now (connection issues in play with friends and special events shouldn't happen now)
- Introducing Player avatars - you can change them from your player profile
- Preparing game for next big feature: Clubs!
For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

New features
- New matchmaking system - fixed missing club keys & trophies issues, fixed a number of “opponent left” issues after finding an opponent, limited the level difference between matched players to 3
- Added a level road with rewards on levelling up

Improvements
- Reconnects improvements
- Multiple button presses protection while joining a challenge to prevent double fee pay
- A warning is now displayed when a player is already in a challenge or event and want to join another one
- League and season rewards handling improvements
- Cricket improvements
- Time left to coins limit reset is now displayed on the “no rewards” popup
- Shanghai win animation is now correctly displayed to an opponent

New features:
• you can now send text messages to your opponent during a game
• you can now block a player to stop receiving messages from them
• a mystery reward may now appear after the game
Improvements:
• reconnections improvements
• standard double out games now end earlier if one of the players finishes and the other can’t finish in a single turn
• rules of ending cricket changed to be more fair (if both players have equal points and one of them closes all numbers, the other doesn’t get the opportunity to draw)
• more text options on the results screen (“good game” included)
• volume sliders in the settings
• the name change is now available for free only once, additional ones require a small price in gems

1. New features
- lucky wheel
- subscriptions
- Halloween is here
- penalty for players that leave a game before it starts
2. Fixes
- fix for the incorrectly displayed max lvl on the top hud bar
- matchmaking improvements
- coins limit fix
- fix for displaying the Russian language (and others) in mail messages
3. Improvements
- better matchamking in special events and challenges
4. Other
- Shot in Time Attack only counts when landed before the time out

- Bug fixes and improvements
- New icon
- Clubs - next big update - coming to the game very soon!
For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

Clubs - Most wanted feature is finally here!

Join or create a club to chat and play friendly battles with club mates.
Fight other clubs in exciting Club Wars to win special perks.
Four new game modes: Around the World, Shanghai, Around the Clock and Count Up.
New emotes system with possibility to mute an opponent. More emotes coming soon!

Clubs - Most wanted feature is finally here!

Join or create a club to chat and play friendly battles with club mates.
Fight other clubs in exciting Club Wars to win special perks.
Four new game modes: Around the World, Shanghai, Around the Clock and Count Up.
New emotes system with possibility to mute an opponent. More emotes coming soon!

- Added clubs search filters.
- Added the number of used keys in club wars to better visualise active players.
- Added notifications when a war key is available and a club war has ended.
- Fix the UI for narrow aspect ratios.
- Japanese language visibility improvements.
- Matchmaking improvements, “Opponent has left” issue should not appear anymore.
- War keys will be not consumed if any matchmaking issue appear.
- Now you can sort your darts collection with various filters.

We have noticed your comments and in the next update we will be adding the possibility to invite players to clubs. In addition to that, playing with FB friends will not be restricted to level 6+ any more.
For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

- New game mode: Skill Shot! Try your skill and win awesome rewards!

- Bug fixes and game improvements.

For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

- New game mode: Skill Shot! Try your skill and win awesome rewards!

- Bug fixes and game improvements.

For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

- possibility to send messages between players and to club members
- now you can play Skillshot every 24h with better prizes
- we have fixed searching clubs issue as well as some issues reported by community

For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

- possibility to send messages between players and to club members
- now you can play Skillshot every 24h with better prizes
- we have fixed searching clubs issue as well as some issues reported by community

For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

• Introduced more statistics in player profile. You can track now your total scored doubles, triples, bullseye’s and 180s. See your wins percentage and also track your averages (average points per 3 darts thrown in standard and count up modes) and MPR (Marks Per Round for Cricket).

BUG FIXES
• Fixed that sometimes watching video didn’t give rewards.
• Fixed that mute emoticons wasn't working in some occasions.
• Club information/points on club sub page will refresh correctly.

TWEAKS
• Improved Game Center login on iOS.
• Changed wins to medals on weekly league. Wins was misleading because player can score more points per victory in club wars and events.
• Added Discord button in settings and in summary screen.

For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage, Discord: https://discord.gg/KnJyBG or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

• Introduced more statistics in player profile. You can track now your total scored doubles, triples, bullseye’s and 180s. See your wins percentage and also track your averages (average points per 3 darts thrown in standard and count up modes) and MPR (Marks Per Round for Cricket).

BUG FIXES
• Fixed that 180s wasn’t correctly counted.
• Fixed reconnects with older versions.
• Fixed that players can’t play after reaching all possible rewards.
• Other various fixes and improvements.

For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage, Discord: https://discord.gg/KnJyBG or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

• Clubs can now be searched by country
• Added a “Report Player” option for offensive names
• Random arena is now available in seasons
• First win of the day in ranked games or club wars will now reward player with bonus gold

TWEAKS
• Hero and Legendary chests are now in chest rotation, a chance for Bullseye is increased
• Visual improvements for all chests• Added a one time bonus when purchasing a gem pack
• Korean translation fixes

For bug reports & feedback please use our official Facebook fanpage, Discord: https://discord.gg/zstZGYS or e-mail us at support@boombit.com.

New features:
• you can now send text messages to your opponent during a game
• you can now block a player to stop receiving messages from them
• a mystery reward may now appear after the game

Improvements:
• reconnections improvements
• standard double out games now end earlier if one of the players finishes and the other can’t finish in a single turn
• rules of ending cricket changed to be more fair (if both players have equal points and one of them closes all numbers, the other doesn’t get the opportunity to draw)
• more text options on the results screen (“good game” included)
• volume sliders in the settings
• the name change is now available for free only once, additional ones require a small price in gems

The newest Darts Club update is here and it’s one of the biggest yet!

- Introducing Tournament mode
Try your skills and play in exciting biweekly tournaments! Become #1 in the World!

- Introducing Tournament mode
Try your skills and play in exciting biweekly tournaments! Become #1 in the World!

- Fix for DQ points not being counted in Tournaments.
- Other improvements and bug fixes.

This update contains quality improvements and new content:

- Now you can collect your Free Chests every 5 minutes instead of 2h!
- Celebrate Easter with us - we've added festive layout and offers for your pleasure.
- Dart throwing system has been improved and is now more fair than ever!
- Fix for DQ points not being counted properly in Tournaments.
- Other improvements and bug fixes.

This update contains new features and quality improvements!

- Log in to the game every day to become a VIP and get awesome bonuses!
- You can now check last online time of other players.
- Concede button added.
- Bug fixes and other improvments.

This update contains new features and quality improvements!
- Introducing personal club rewards - the more active you are during club wars the better rewards you will get!
- new friend invitation - now you can add anyone to friends by visiting their profile or on the result screen after the match!
- skill shoot performance improvement
- optimized shop menu and added additional options to obtain VIP points
- a lot of bugs fixed

This update introduces awesome new features and Quality of Life improvements based on your feedback!
• Reconnect improvements
• 6 new Legendary Darts
• Perfect game statistics, season leaderboard, and bonus Trophies
• Improved Darts Set selection in Tournaments & Special Events
• Added possibility for leaders to change Club Names

Thank you for your ongoing support and for helping us make this game better!

We are thrilled to present the 3rd ANNIVERSARY UPDATE!
• introducing a brand new Single player Mode “CHALLENGES”
• VIBRATIONS implemented to complement dart throws
• introducing a brand new Special Event “WILD CRICKET”
• 3 NEW DARTS added to the last Arena
• invite to clubs added to result screen
• support/victory chest counts towards Ad Mega-Chest
• "Vibrations" button on/off displays properly
• fixed result screen not showing for Diamond players
